document.full_text: almost half of all adults worldwide suffer from headache disorders such as migraines and tension headaches and the problem has huge economic and societal costs, the world health organization said on tuesday.
document.title: who report finds headaches have "enormous" costs
lines_and_colors: almost half of all adults worldwide suffer from headache disorders such as migraines and tension headaches and the problem has huge economic and societal costs, the world health organization said on tuesday.
